page.title: 03MANOR FARM CORSTON WEST BATH
page.content: { This is an old manor house which we visited to ask the farmers wife 22 questions about the farm.On the farm there are 650 acres of land .They have 25{calves}in the pen and one{horse whose name is Hutch. They have some fully grown{cows}and some chickens.There is a very clean milking parlour of which has not been used for 6 years.We went inside an enormous storehouse where 1000 tons{ of{silage}lay under an enormouse black sheet.They have four{Dogs}whose names are Teeko,Spot,Sam and Puddles. They have five tractors to plough their fields.They have a barn which is used for barn dances.4 people work on the large farm,2 of which are the farmer and his son.They live in a farmhouse which belongs to the{Duke of {Cornwall.
